top_categories.workout_context: 150 miles. Your legs will beg to quit after 120. This trains the power output you need from mile 130 onward.
53ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At Spotted Horse Ultra, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Spotted Horse Ultra. Train it until it feels boring.
Spotted Horse Ultra's Iowa prairie, Ultra-endurance forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 150 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Spotted Horse Ultra's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before October.
150 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 150 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 8,000ft of climbing on Iowa prairie gravel does to your power file on race day.
8,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
8,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Tempo is Spotted Horse Ultra's race pace. The wattage you'll hold for 150 miles on Iowa prairie gravel. Train it until it's automatic.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 150 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 150 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Spotted Horse Ultra requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on iowa prairie gravel to build confidence. Expect: iowa prairie, ultra-endurance, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Over Under to prepare you for 150 miles of iowa prairie gravel in Iowa.
